Package au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.util

Class FileUtilities

java.lang.Object
au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.util.FileUtilities
public class FileUtilities extends Object
Utilities to manipulate files independent of OS.
Author:
Shayne Flint - 20/10/2014

  • Method Details

    • deleteFileTree

      public static void deleteFileTree​(File dir) throws IOException
      Delete all files and directories including the root directory.
      Parameters:
      dir - the root of the directory tree to delete
      Throws:
      IOException - If deletion fails.

    • identicalStreams

      public static boolean identicalStreams​(BufferedInputStream fis1, BufferedInputStream fis2) throws IOException
      Test if two streams are identical. Efficient and quick, based on this post.
      Parameters:
      fis1 - The first stream
      fis2 - The second stream.
      Returns:
      true if identical, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is a file reading error.

    • copyFileReplace

      public static void copyFileReplace​(File src, File dst)
      Copy a file to a target destination, erasing the target file it it exists.
      Parameters:
      src - the source file
      dst - the target destination file

    • makePath

      public static String makePath​(String... pathElement)
      Construct a OS-independent path from its arguments. Has no effect on the file system, i.e. this is just String manipulation. Ignores empty and null Strings in its arguments.
      Parameters:
      pathElement - a list of path elements (i.e. OS-compatible names)
      Returns:
      the full path name

    • makeFile

      public static File makeFile​(String... pathElements)
      Construct a OS-independent path from its arguments. Has no effect on the file system, i.e. this is just String manipulation. Ignores empty and null Strings in its arguments.
      Parameters:
      pathElements - a list of path elements (i.e. OS-compatible names)
      Returns:
      the File handle to the path

    • catFile

      public static void catFile​(File file)
      Print a (text) file to the console.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to print

    • catReader

      public static void catReader​(Reader reader)
      Print a (text) file reader to the console.
      Parameters:
      reader - the file Reader

    • createPath

      public static void createPath​(String... pathElements)
      Create a path in the file system from its arguments.
      Parameters:
      pathElements - a list of path elements (i.e. OS-compatible names)

    • createFile

      public static void createFile​(File file, Object... lines)
      Create a file and write it to the file system.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to create
      lines - the lines to write to the file.

    • readFile

      public static String[] readFile​(File file) throws IOException
      Read a text file from the file system and return as a String array.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to read
      Returns:
      the content of the file as an array of Strings
      Throws:
      IOException - If file reading error.
